entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
